description.jp:
ニフルハイム帝国の宰相。「魔導兵」の
開発提案 促進により地位を確立し そ
れ以降政治の実権を握っている。
飄々とした立ち振る舞いは相手の警戒心
を解き 自分の望む方向へ相手を誘導す
るなど 老獪な政治指導者を彷彿とさせ
る手腕の持ち主で 掴みどころがない。
description.gl: Chancellor of Niflheim. Rose to power through introducing magitek to Niflheim's military. His nonchalance puts others at ease、 allowing him to guide them as he sees fit. Elusive、 his cunning is reminiscent of political leaders of the past.

jp.text: こう見えてオレ\n顔が広いんだよね
今はさ 助けにきたんだ
10年程度で\nオレを超えたと思うなよ
オレがどれだけ\n闇の中で生きてきたと思ってる
あれ？ 復讐を果たせそうだな
へえ 最後 それ選んだんだ

gl.text: I may not look like much、 but I do have some influence.
At your service. And more importantly、 to your aid.
You think ten years is a long time!?
It is nothing to me! I have lived in darkness for ages!
Ah... My revenge is soon at hand...
So、 that is how you would end it.

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.gl: 2-hit Melee BRV attack\nIncreases BRV based on MAX BRV when inflicting Break
desc.jp: 2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃\n対象ブレイク時\n自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算

desc.gl:
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Increases BRV based on MAX BRV after HP attack when inflicting Break
With at least 3 levels of special effect Spectral Charge:
 • Increases BRV based on MAX BRV
 • Triggers 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • While Warp-Strike Extension equipped: Triggered BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
desc.jp:
2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
対象ブレイク時
HP攻撃後 自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
特殊効果「ファントムギア」3段階以上付与中 ターゲットに以下の追加攻撃が発動
自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
「シフトブレイクエクステンド」装備時 以下の効果が追加
BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し 合計BRV威力も極大アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

desc.en:
2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack
Increases own BRV by 20% of Max BRV after HP attack when inflicting BREAK
Self: 4 turns 1 level of special effect [Spectral Charge] (limit 3)

When [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
• Triggers follow-up attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (70% per hit)

[Spectral Charge I~III]
• Restores BRV by 5/7/10% of Max BRV
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 10/15/20%

desc.en:
3-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Self: 4 turns [Shadowstep]

When [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
• Triggers follow-up attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (70% per hit)

While [Shadowstep] is active
• Nullifies Action Delay when inflicting BREAK (= extra turn)
* Extra turn does not increase turn count
* Cannot trigger an additional turn during extra turn
desc.gl:
3-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 4 turns Shadowstep
With at least 3 levels of special effect Spectral Charge:
 • Increases BRV based on MAX BRV
 • Triggers 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • While Warp-Strike Extension equipped: Triggered BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Inflicting Break while Shadowstep active grants additional turn; does not grant additional turns during burst mode, but instead grants one additional turn after burst mode ends; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another

desc.en:
Cancels all enemies' BREAK status
3-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Self: 4 turns 1 level of special effect [Spectral Charge] (limit 3)

When [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
• Triggers follow-up attack
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (70% per hit)

When [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
• Becomes [Rising Phantom+]
　∟ 3-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 210%

name.jp: シフトブレイクエクステンド

desc.en:
[Warp-Strike] use +1

When using [Warp-Strike]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 220%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When follow-up attack is triggered by any ability
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3
• Increases total BRV potency by 100%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When [Spectral Charge] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV when inflicting BREAK
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (20% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV after HP attack when inflicting BREAK
　∟ Triggers follow-up attack when [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
desc.gl:
Warp-Strike use +1

When using Warp-Strike:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When additional attack triggered:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While Spectral Charge active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases BRV based on MAX BRV when inflicting Break)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases BRV based on MAX BRV when inflicting Break after HP attack; triggers additional attack with at least 3 levels of Spectral Charge active)
desc.jp:
・使用回数＋1

「シフトブレイク」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

「追加攻撃」発動時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

「ファントムギア」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・対象ブレイク時
　自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・対象ブレイク時 HP攻撃後
　自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・特殊効果「ファントムギア」3段階以上付与中
　ターゲットに追加攻撃が発動

name.jp: ファントムライズBRVヒットプラスフォースアドバンス＋＋

desc.en:
When using [Rising Phantom], [Rising Phantom+]
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 30%

When using [Rising Phantom]
• 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 110%

When using [Rising Phantom+]
• 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 220%

When special effect [Spectral Charge] is at 5 levels
• [Rising Phantom+] becomes [Rising Phantom++]
　∟ All enemies: Inflicts BREAK (cancels BREAK status if already broken)
　∟ 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered 3 times
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 320% compared to [Rising Phantom+]
　∟ Does not consume use count on next turn (excl. some abilities)

While [Spectral Charge] is active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV when inflicting BREAK
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 10% of Max BRV after HP attack when inflicting BREAK
　∟ Triggers follow-up attack when [Spectral Charge] is at least 3 levels
desc.gl:
When using Rising Phantom, Rising Phantom+:
 • 3-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

With 5 levels of Spectral Charge:
 • Rising Phantom+ becomes Rising Phantom++ (inflicts Break on all enemies before BRV attack; cancels Break and inflicts Break if target afflicted with Break; 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; next turn after use does not consume ability use count [some abilities excluded])

While Spectral Charge active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP Attack; increases BRV based on MAX BRV if target afflicted with Break)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP Attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV based on MAX BRV if target afflicted with Break; triggers additional attack with at least 3 levels of Spectral Charge active)
desc.jp:
